properties.description:
Will always be loaded as full.

- For full load without partitioning use:
Parameter tables = ["{'schema': 'CORPORATIVO', 'table':'MUNICIPIO','load_type':'full', 'partition_column':'null', 'columns': 'COD_MUNICIPIO,NOM_MUNICIPIO,SIG_UF,NUM_CEP,IND_TIPO_MUNICIPIO,IND_SITUACAO_MUNICIPIO,COD_MUNICIPIO_PAI'}"]

Execute pipeline = template_import_table_full

ATTENTION: Although this is specified as an object from SCAE, schema is CORPORATIVO

As this object is really small, you can add: 'raw':{'coalesce': 1}

activities.name: raw_load_bdo_unified__0__switch_env
activities.description: Run template pipeline to import tables

defaultValue: {'schema': 'uc', 'table':'course_performances','load_type':'full','partition_column':'null', 'columns': 'c_performance_id, group_id, user_id, c_performance_date, c_performance_score, teacher_score, c_completed, teacher_note, next_due_date, credit_units, score_data'}
